20110126162358.000|20110126162400.000|TR0|able to resolve her hydrocephalus 
20110126162400.000|20110126162403.000|TR0|situation.  Hydrocephalus is having fluid 
20110126162403.000|20110126162406.000|TR0|on the brain, very dangerous situation.  
20110126162406.000|20110126162408.000|TR0|And they were able to resolve it.  So, she

20110126164805.000|20110126164808.000|TR0|
20110126164808.000|20110126164810.000|TR0|That would be back in October of 1957 when 
20110126164810.000|20110126164813.000|TR0|the Sputnik I was first launched by the 
20110126164813.000|20110126164816.000|TR0|Soviets.  That alarmed the U.S., caught 
20110126164816.000|20110126164818.000|TR0|the U.S. off guard and led to NASA being 
20110126164818.000|20110126164821.000|TR0|created in 1958, launched the space race, 
20110126164821.000|20110126164824.000|TR0|of course.
20110126164824.000|20110126164826.000|TR0|
20110126164826.000|20110126164829.000|TR0|And President Obama's point last night 
20110126164829.000|20110126164832.000|TR0|being that once again he wants the U.S. to 
20110126164832.000|20110126164834.000|TR0|innovate and basically take this moment of

20110126164840.000|20110126164842.000|TR0|are going to actually beat them.

20110126164845.000|20110126164848.000|TR0|Interesting footnote is the fact that the 
20110126164848.000|20110126164850.000|TR0|president, you noted before, is right now 
20110126164850.000|20110126164853.000|TR0|in Wisconsin, touring some clean energy 
20110126164853.000|20110126164856.000|TR0|facilities, for example, to try to promote 
20110126164856.000|20110126164858.000|TR0|his programs.  It turns out that very town

20110126164901.000|20110126164904.000|TR0|satellites, part of it, just dropped out

20110126165754.000|20110126165757.000|TR0|McNeal calls it.  She actually paid off 
20110126165757.000|20110126165759.000|TR0|$20,000 in debt in a little over two years.
